flavor_text: "Hrrngh! Someday I'm going to hurl this . . . er . . . roll this . . . hrrngh . . . nudge this boulder right down a cliff."

name: Boldwyr Intimidator
oracle_text: Cowards can't block Warriors.
{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.
{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

name: Emblem of the Warmind
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
Creatures you control have haste.
flavor_text:
"It takes but one spark to ignite a parched forest. Our hearts, I fear, are too dry for this new visitor."
—Elek Longbeard

name: Flowstone Embrace
oracle_text: Enchant creature
{T}: Enchanted creature gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The seventh symbol, the Mark of Stone, stores the power of ancient Rath."
—Tome of Elemental Mastery

name: Ghostfire
oracle_text: Ghostfire is colorless.
Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

name: Grinning Ignus
oracle_text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text:
"Take care what you offer the ignus. Food, perhaps. Coins. But nothing flammable!"
—Stovic, village eccentric

name: Henchfiend of Ukor
oracle_text: Haste
Echo {1}{B} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
{B/R}: Henchfiend of Ukor gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Homing Sliver
oracle_text: Each Sliver card in each player's hand has slivercycling {3}.
Slivercycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Sliver card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

name: Shah of Naar Isle
oracle_text: Trample
Echo {0} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
When Shah of Naar Isle's echo cost is paid, each opponent may draw up to three cards.

name: Skizzik Surger
oracle_text: Haste
Echo—Sacrifice two lands. (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

name: Steamflogger Boss
oracle_text: Other Riggers you control get +1/+0 and have haste.
If a Rigger you control would assemble a Contraption, it assembles two Contraptions instead.
flavor_text:
"Whip the Xs! Pinch the Os!
What we're building, no one knows!"

name: Storm Entity
oracle_text: Haste
Storm Entity enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other spell cast this turn.
flavor_text: Dweldian magi don't enter the Realm of Thrones when they die. Instead their souls are drawn to great works of magic.

name: Tarox Bladewing
oracle_text: Flying, haste
Grandeur — Discard another card named Tarox Bladewing: Tarox Bladewing gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
flavor_text: Despising his siblings as insults to his line, he finds and devours each in turn.

name: Thunderblade Charge
oracle_text: Thunderblade Charge deals 3 damage to any target.

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Thunderblade Charge is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{R}{R}{R}. If you do, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

name: Cyclical Evolution
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Exile Cyclical Evolution with three time counters on it.

Suspend 3—{2}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Force of Savagery
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text:
"Life cannot be created and then abandoned. It must be nurtured and fed so that it may express its ripened might."
—Freyalise

name: Heartwood Storyteller
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, each of that player's opponents may draw a card.
flavor_text: His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.

name: Kavu Primarch
oracle_text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Llanowar Augur
oracle_text: Sacrifice Llanowar Augur: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
flavor_text: "I am irrelevant. The future I hold in my hands is everything."

name: Llanowar Empath
oracle_text: When Llanowar Empath enters the battlefield, scry 2, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into your hand. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Llanowar Mentor
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 green Elf Druid creature token named Llanowar Elves. It has "{T}: Add {G}."

name: Magus of the Vineyard
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, that player adds {G}{G}.
flavor_text: Battered and beaten by years of salt and claw, he never ceased to walk, and to seed. Only now, in this time of rebirth, do his seeds take root.

name: Petrified Plating
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

Suspend 2—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Quiet Disrepair
oracle_text: Enchant artifact or enchantment
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Destroy enchanted permanent.
• You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Artifice has always stood upon nature's shoulders. Let us watch nature take a turn."
—Freyalise

name: Ravaging Riftwurm
oracle_text: Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Vanishing 2 (This creature enters the battlefield with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
If Ravaging Riftwurm was kicked, it enters the battlefield with three additional time counters on it.

name: Riftsweeper
oracle_text: When Riftsweeper enters the battlefield, choose target face-up exiled card. Its owner shuffles it into their library.
flavor_text: "Beings of the rifts are not natural. No longer will these abominations tread upon the body of Gaea."

name: Rites of Flourishing
oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
Each player may play an additional land on each of their turns.
flavor_text: "Dance, and bring forth the coil! It is an umbilical to Gaea herself, fattening us with the earth's rich bounty."

name: Sprout Swarm
oracle_text: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Summoner's Pact
oracle_text: Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

name: Utopia Mycon
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Utopia Mycon.
Remove three spore counters from Utopia Mycon: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Add one mana of any color.

name: Wrap in Vigor
oracle_text: Regenerate each creature you control.
flavor_text: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.

name: Baru, Fist of Krosa
oracle_text: Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield, green creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
Grandeur — Discard another card named Baru, Fist of Krosa: Create an X/X green Wurm creature token, where X is the number of lands you control.

name: Centaur Omenreader
oracle_text: As long as Centaur Omenreader is tapped, creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: The wisdom of the omenreaders is legendary. Creatures travel for miles through icy peril to seek their counsel.

name: Edge of Autumn
oracle_text: If you control four or fewer lands, search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
Cycling—Sacrifice a land. (Sacrifice a land, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: "At harvest are seeds of next year sown."

name: Imperiosaur
oracle_text: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast Imperiosaur.
flavor_text:
"An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself."
—Olanti, Muraganda druid

name: Muraganda Petroglyphs
oracle_text: Creatures with no abilities get +2/+2.
flavor_text: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

name: Nacatl War-Pride
oracle_text: Nacatl War-Pride must be blocked by exactly one creature if able.

Whenever Nacatl War-Pride attacks, create X tokens that are copies of Nacatl War-Pride and that are tapped and attacking, where X is the number of creatures defending player controls. Exile the tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Phosphorescent Feast
oracle_text: Chroma — Reveal any number of cards in your hand. You gain 2 life for each green mana symbol in those cards' mana costs.
flavor_text:
"Mushroom Queen sits among her spores,
Enjoying life and avoiding chores."
—Ibblian pixie ditty

name: Quagnoth
oracle_text: Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Quagnoth, return it to your hand.

name: Spellwild Ouphe
oracle_text: Spells that target Spellwild Ouphe cost {2} less to cast.
flavor_text:
"You'd think that their big glowing eyes would be almost hypnotic to look at. In fact, it's the other way around—they are entranced by nearly everything they see."
—Balecki, Spellwild druid

name: Sporoloth Ancient
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sporoloth Ancient.
Creatures you control have "Remove two spore counters from this creature: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

name: Tarmogoyf
oracle_text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

name: Thornweald Archer
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor_text: Their arrows are tipped with basilisk eyes and fletched with cockatrice feathers.

name: Virulent Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have poisonous 1. (Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Glittering Wish
oracle_text: You may choose a multicolored card you own from outside the game, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Exile Glittering Wish.
flavor_text: She wished for gold, but not for the strength to carry it.

name: Jhoira of the Ghitu
oracle_text: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

name: Sliver Legion
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1 for each other Sliver on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Hidden within the clicking, chittering swarm is a unique mind, still young, but growing more aware as time passes.

name: Akroma's Memorial
oracle_text: Creatures you control have flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, and protection from black and from red.
flavor_text:
"No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
—Memorial inscription

name: Cloud Key
oracle_text: As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: The musical sound of its turning triggers the tumblers of revelation.

name: Coalition Relic
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Epochrasite
oracle_text: Epochrasite enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it if you didn't cast it from your hand.

When Epochrasite dies, exile it with three time counters on it and it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast this card without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Sliversmith
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver artifact creature token named Metallic Sliver.
flavor_text: After centuries of labor, its creations outnumber those they were to mimic.

name: Soultether Golem
oracle_text: Vanishing 1 (This creature enters the battlefield with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a time counter on Soultether Golem.

name: Sword of the Meek
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+2.
Equip {2}
Whenever a 1/1 creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Sword of the Meek from your graveyard to the battlefield, then attach it to that creature.

name: Veilstone Amulet
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn.
flavor_text: Sometimes it's ostentatious to go unseen.

name: Darksteel Garrison
oracle_text: Fortified land has indestructible.
Whenever fortified land becomes tapped, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Fortify {3} ({3}: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the land leaves.)

name: Whetwheel
oracle_text: {X}{X}, {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard.
Morph {3} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Dakmor Salvage
oracle_text: Dakmor Salvage enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.

Dredge 2 (If you would draw a card, instead you may put exactly two cards from the top of your library into your graveyard. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, draw a card.)

name: Keldon Megaliths
oracle_text: Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Hellbent — {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to any target. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

name: Llanowar Reborn
oracle_text: Llanowar Reborn enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Graft 1 (This land enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this land onto it.)

name: New Benalia
oracle_text: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped.
When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {W}.

name: Tolaria West
oracle_text: Tolaria West enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.

Transmute {1}{U}{U} ({1}{U}{U}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with converted mana cost 0, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Dryad Arbor
oracle_text: (Dryad Arbor isn't a spell, it's affected by summoning sickness, and it has "{T}: Add {G}.")
flavor_text:
"Touch no tree, break no branch, and speak only the question you wish answered."
—Von Yomm, elder druid, to her initiates

name: Graven Cairns
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Shamans of Kar-Sengir claim that their sun sets because it can no longer bear the gaze of those pain-carved cliffs.

name: Grove of the Burnwillows
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Each opponent gains 1 life.
flavor_text: Spring is the most beautiful season in the grove, when the new leaves open from their ember-buds in a race of leaping flames.

name: Horizon Canopy
oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} or {W}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Horizon Canopy: Draw a card.
flavor_text: The great leaves are resilient underfoot. Heavy steps do not bruise them, but release a sweet and spicy scent.

name: Nimbus Maze
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W}. Activate this ability only if you control an Island.
{T}: Add {U}. Activate this ability only if you control a Plains.
flavor_text: To find its center is to find one's own.

name: River of Tears
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U}. If you played a land this turn, add {B} instead.
flavor_text:
"The Westfolk wept, and their tears wore winding rivers into the cheek of the world."
—Glem the Lonebard, "Origins of Kholon"

name: Zoetic Cavern
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
Morph {2} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor_text: Nothing lives within it, yet there is life.
